title.rendered: Stéphane Rolland Presented SS22 for Paris Haute Couture Week

content.rendered:
Fresh house Stphane Rolland presented elegant and chick collection for SS22 Haute Couture Week 2022


By Fashion-editor : Christina V Henningstad  Production: Fashionview
